Location SMS Phone Notifications Battery (No optimization) About Necesito Ayuda Emergency assistance application created to help elderly or vulnerable people request help quickly in difficult situations.
No advertising. No data collection. No tracking. Works only to help people contact trusted caregivers. ======= Turn on permissions so help works every time. Green = ready. Red = not ready. ● READY ● NOT READY
